attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE!!!! It keeps crashing and asking for my information. I’m worried the app may be hacking my phone and storing all of my info. It does not work at all and I think it bugged out for a second in Russian? Weird. Don’t know what that was about. Just don't get it. It’s some bad news. Also bad design - there’s too much orange. Not a pleasant color.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I wanted to see how this app would work because a lot of people on social media were recommending this, so I downloaded it. Within a couple of minutes the app crashed. It also crashed the rest of my apps and i thought it was my phone. But as soon as I deleted the app no more crashes occured.

attributes.title: Completely terrible and does help or do much of anything
attributes.review: I don’t know this generation z sorta thing going around trying to get this removed but this is my personal thing not a group removal. It doesn’t work for me and glitches almost all the time. It is also wildly inconvenient and inconsistent. I did not like it in a category!

attributes.title: This app ended my life. 🍊
attributes.review:
I was alive before I downloaded this app. However, as soon as I downloaded and opened the app I was bombarded with so much ✨orange✨that my eyes started bleeding and my soul left my body. I am now dead. I would not recommend this app unless you would like to be bombarded by a giant cheeto man before your life is sucked out of your body forever.

-gen z❤️

attributes.title: Amazing App
attributes.review: This app has everything a trump supporter needs to keep up with the campaign and speeches. I recommend this app to people who don’t use the  “🧚🏻✨” emojis. -David

attributes.title: Gen Z😌
attributes.review: The app is constantly running my battery, spams personal info. There are way to many ads, it also slows and glitches my phone out every few minutes I use it. Would not recommend to download on any device at all due to many many disappointing technical features:)

attributes.userName: I HATE THIS APP NO NO NO
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!!
attributes.review: This app is terrible do not use I was having high hopes of this app being good and it is terrible it is nothing like I thought it would be and I can’t believe I wasted my one minute on this app it is just the worst app I have ever had will never be using again and I do not recommend to anyone because it is that terrible.

attributes.title: Terrible!!!
attributes.review: This app is honestly a terrible app and I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone out there. It’s so slow, I can’t do anything in this app, and the buttons work so slowly! As an impatient person this is the worse thing an app can have. I hope none of you guys get it because you’ll never get anything done with this app. UNPRODUCTIVE!

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE. it took 2 weeks to download even tho my wifi was strong af 😌 after it actually downloaded i got so scared that i yeeted myself to mt. everest because i saw this creepy looking ✨cheeto orange man✨ on my screen and had to call an ambulance 🤢 this app is DISGUSTING i would never get it again. waist of space on ur phone 🤢🤢🤢 all i have to say is trump 2020 🇺🇸 in jail ✨✨✨✨

attributes.title: disgusting!! horrible app it should be taken down immediately
attributes.review: this app took over 2 weeks to download!! outrageous! i even deleted animal crossing so that i would have more storage, and it didn’t help at all!! the app then continued to glitch and malfunction every time i used it! it would turn off / restart my phone, and even more mysteriously, i always noticed that after using the app my bank account balance would go down!! suspicious!! i think that this app is a terrorist organization pretending to be our amazing president! it should be taken down immediately.
